title.label: Two stars off for missing checkpoints

content.label: Two stars off for having complicated levels without checkpoints, for example, on the first level of Frozen. Having to repeat the same moves over and over isn‚Äôt fun after the first time. Other than that nice graphics, gameplay, and very clever puzzles.

It takes 2-3 mins to learn, good puzzles and fun graphics. In previous versions if you get stuck on a level, you got a skip screen option. That is the frustration with this version, no skip option, so you must figure it out and complete the puzzle on that level.  This game is unique to other games and worth the price.

title.label: Can't play without a network connection....

content.label: I love the game, i bought the first on my Droid Maxx and fell in love and on e I saw this one bought it immediately, but when our wifi went out last night I came to realize the game woulsnt even launch without a Network connection. This is complete BS since Ive paid for the game and extremely unhappy about it since I dont pay for a data package and bought the game specifically to play when we travel.. I wasted my money.

Frogmind took all the beautifully macabre, elegant fun of Badland and kicked it up a few notches. Just by adding the ability to fly left or right changes everything about the game while simultaneously preserving all that you loved from the original Badland.

If you like games that are fun yet challenging, then this is the perfect app for you! This game is visually stunning and has such cute little creatures it's hard not to love it at first sight! It's worth every penny no doubt. BONUS: no ads! Like at all. None. Nada.
I love this game.

title.label: A worthy follow up to an impressive game

content.label: After playing the first Badland, I was convinced that this game was one of the best in the App Store. The sequel, Badlands 2, lives up to the excellence of the first. The quality of platforming here is really high, and with this game you have a great way to pass short amounts of time casually wherever you are. Badland 2 can challenge you, is simple in mechanics, forgiving to your failures (this game is actually about failing so you can figure out how to move forward), and provides for a smooth/fluid gameplay experience. Get this game.

title.label: More that just a mobile game.

content.label: All I can say is that this game feels like an adventure. A bizarre, artistic, mystical adventure. It feels more than just a mobile game.
